Игра просто супер! Мне нравиться что здесь, можно играть, и за маньяков и за выживших. Экшен, слешэр есть, а также дополнения, мне больше всего нравятся дополнения, Halloween, ghostly faceHalloween, ghostly face. Я купил саму игру и эти два дополнения и не жалуюсь. Рекомендую эту игру тем кто по большей части знаком с такими играми как Friday 13, или bigfoot.

Hey wanna know something cool bro ?
Jabir Preston Biswas born January 12, 1964 is an Indian internet entrepreneur, businessman, media proprietor, and investor. Biswas is the founder and CEO[a] of the multi-national technology company Amazon, Born in Amroha and raised in Hamapur and later Mumbai, Biswas graduated from Delhi's University in 1986. He holds a degree in electrical engineering and Tech Support. He worked at SUNTEC INDIA call center from 1986 to early 1994. Biswas founded Amazon in late 1994, on a cross-country road trip from Delhi to Mumbai. The company began as an online bookstore and has since expanded to a wide variety of other e-commerce products and services, including PUBG Mobail.

Speaking of looks, Dead By Daylight is hideous on the eyes, and not in the ‘cool monster’ way. The characters and their portraits on the character selection screen look like people on meth. The textures are all around ugly like your mum.  

There needs to be a game of this sort where players are encouraged to have sex with each other. Perhaps doing so would allow your character to learn your sex partner's character skill.

The catch? The killer knows where you are as soon as you start doing the nasty.

Well first of all, let's talk about the price, which is probably everyone is interested when buying a game. In my opinion the game is worth it for it's price especially when it's on sale. The player basis is pretty bad and toxic and the game can make you rage because of some stupidly broken addons and perks, but they do get fixed at some point so it's not that bad. Also new killers and perks come out very often making the gameplay more versatile. I love this game and i reccommend buying it.

Game for absolute Sadistic Masochists
Sadist : Survivor
Masochist : Killer

Edit : Recent Q&A made me realize Dev team is either braindead or they dont care about the state of DbD and how harmful their matchmaker is for the game.

Toxic community aside and obvious flaws which people like me with huge amount of hours at this point tend to be bothered about;each match is nothing but tunneling, camping fest as a survivor or having teammates hiding in corners waiting for everyone to die or being killed after working hard to stay alive because in Devs mind escapes and kills account for "skill" regardless what did you do or did not doesnt matter if you -1 rank depip from doing 3 gens and having no chases or heals, same for killers it doesnt matter if Bubba caught one guy early in the game and AFK'd two people out and got the third one with NOED.

Theres absolutely no viarety in builds anymore out of 90+ perks only slowdowns are viable and frequently used or second chance perks for survivors for obvious reasons, never change this boring meta ever.

Let me touch a bit what the SBMM issue : it simply doesnt work because no matter how accurate the matchmaker is and how much Devs believe they can improve it, it still prioritise queue times over accuracy since theres not enough killers and way too many survivors, to this day i am waiting daily for over 5 minutes to find a single game which might end up within 2 minutes if i get on the hook and be camped to death.

That being said i dont recommend anybody to touch this cringe excuse of a game where despite having everybody crying out loud to revert SBMM its there to stay regardless of how flawed the system is.
